items.title: J&J (JNJ) Faces $8M Verdict Over Talc Case; Stock Still Gains 4.66% YTD
items.description: Johnson & Johnson (NYSE:JNJ) is one of the 10 undervalued blue chip stocks analysts recommend for smart investing. On June 18, Dean Omar Branham Shirley, LLP, a Dallas, Texas-based law firm, announced an $8 million verdict against Johnson & Johnson in Suffolk County, Massachusetts. The verdict was awarded to Janice Paluzzi, an 84-year-old Massachusetts woman [â€¦]

items.title: MRK's Winrevair Phase III Study in Newly Diagnosed PAH Meets Goal
items.description: Merck's Winrevair meets goal in a phase III study in newly diagnosed PAH patients, showing strong efficacy.
